title: [Extension Proposal] OpenSearch REST client

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

OpenSearch extension will be based on the existing Elasticsearch extension

OpenSearch and Elasticsearch clients are drifting more and more apart with each release and the best way to approach this, is to create an OpenSearch based client extension for Quarkus. 
Most of the cloud providers are offering managed OpenSearch as managed service but there's no way to make use of new features with the (for very good reasons: license issues) unmaintained Quarkus Elasticsearch client.

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

quarkus-opensearch

### Short description

OpenSearch extension for connecting to an OpenSearch cluster
